content: संसक्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Adhered or stuck together. {@--2@} Adhering or clinging to, attached to, sticking close to. {@--3@} Joined or linked together, closely connected; प्रांतेषु संसक्तनमेरुशाखं <ls>Ku. 3. 43</ls>; <ls>R. 7. 24.</ls> {@--4@} Near, contiguous, adjoining. {@--5@} Confused, mixed, mingled, blended; मदमुखरमयूरीमुक्तसंसक्तकेकः <ls>Māl. 9. 5</ls>; कलिंदकन्या सथूरां गताऽपि गंगोर्मिसंसक्तजलेव भाति <ls>R. 6. 48</ls>; <ls>Māl. 5. 11.</ls> {@--6@} Intent on. {@--7@} Endowed with, possessed of. {@--8@} Fastened, restrained.
